scenario.name: register_invite_bye
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[field1]> Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp>;+g.oma.sip-im;language="en,fr";+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel" Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] Max-Forwards: 70 Route: <sip:orig@scscf-1.imsdomain.com:6060;lr> Accept-Contact: *;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel" P-Preferred-Service: urn:urn-7:3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, PUBLISH, MESSAGE, PRACK, UPDATE Privacy: none P-Access-Network-Info: ADSL;utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 User-Agent: SIPp/Linux P-Preferred-Identity: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Supported: replaces, timer, 100rel
v=0 o=doubango 1983 678901 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 a=tcap:1 RTP/AVPF m=audio 32270 RTP/AVP 8 0 9 113 112 3 97 98 99 111 101 a=ptime:20 a=minptime:1 a=maxptime:255 a=silenceSupp:off - - - - a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000/1 a=rtpmap:9 G722/8000/1 a=rtpmap:113 AMR/8000/1 a=imageattr:113 octet-align=1 a=fmtp:113 octet-align=1 a=rtpmap:112 AMR/8000/1 a=imageattr:112 octet-align=0 a=fmtp:112 octet-align=0 a=rtpmap:3 GSM/8000/1 a=rtpmap:97 SPEEX/8000/1 a=rtpmap:98 SPEEX/16000/1 a=rtpmap:99 SPEEX/32000/1 a=rtpmap:111 opus/48000/2 a=fmtp:111 maxplaybackrate=48000; sprop-maxcapturerate=16000; stereo=0; sprop-stereo=0; useinbandfec=0; usedtx=0 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000/1 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=pcfg:1 t=1 a=sendrecv a=rtcp-mux a=ssrc:1667766919 cname:9da1f59adbfb87c4ec720e1698512711 a=ssrc:1667766919 mslabel:6994f7d1-6ce9-4fbd-acfd-84e5131ca2e2 a=ssrc:1667766919 label:doubango@audio m=text 19556 RTP/AVP 124 123 a=rtpmap:124 t140/1000 a=fmtp:124 cps=30 a=rtpmap:123 red/1000 a=fmtp:123 124/124/124/124 a=pcfg:1 t=1 a=sendrecv a=rtcp-mux

ACK sip:[service]@[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Route: <sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];lr=on> From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=SIPpTag01[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[field1]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Phone Call Content-Length: [len]

BYE sip:[service]@[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport Route: <sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];lr=on> From: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=SIPpTag01[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Phone Call Content-Length: 0
